attributes.action: Theresa May should resign as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Trump's ban on those from certain Muslim majority countries furthers the terrorist's cause and incites acts of violence against innocent Muslims. By not unambiguously condemning this, she is betraying the values of our country and failing to represent the views of its people.
She should immediately resign as Prime Minister and there should be a general election so that the public may have it's voice on the UK's future relationship with the Trump administration.
attributes.background: Churchill said “An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile, hoping it will eat him last.” Theresa May is feeding the crocodile by appeasing Trump. While others have unambiguously denounced the new US immigration rules, she has shown she regards winning a trade agreement as more important.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
